Question & Options:

Options:
A. Taare Zameen Par
B. Slumdog Millionaire

Which award did *Taare Zameen Par* win in 2008?
Options:
A. National Film Award for Best Film on Family Welfare
B. Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film
C. Filmfare Award for Best Film
D. National Award for Best Feature Film
Correct Answer: National Film Award for Best Film on Family Welfare
